name: Only One World
description:
This is my submission for the gmtkjam.

Only One, this is the theme for the gmtkjam 2019. in my game there isn't only one thing, it is a little game with a puzzel, chest, monster and dungeon, but with a little twist, see your self.

Update: Add Only One Vilage and Only One NPC. sword must be bought.

This is Only One World.
